price: Кажи Мојим створењима да сам Ја, заиста, Онај Који опрашта грехе, Милостиви,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
